post.author: Admin
post.title: Royalaire, Royalette and Percussion tryouts in May - Band Camp in June
post.description: The Audition Calendar for all Royalette, Royalaire and Percussion applicants are now posted on the F
post.content:
The Audition Calendar for all Royalette, Royalaire and Percussion applicants are now posted on the Forms & PDF's page of Mr. Vitale’s website. We will update the dates below as soon as we get this info.

  • Royalettes 1st Audition Clinic is 5/12
  • Royalaire 1st Audition Clinic is 5/19
  • Percussion meeting is 5/27

Mr. Vitale has also posted the calendar for the 2014-2015 season.

Also, the 2014 Band camp occurs June 16-18 & 24. See the calendar on Mr. Vitale’s website for details regarding specific times.

The August Band camp start date is July 31.
